label: axiom-7
name: Axiom 7
statement:
Projection compatibility
There exists a function $R_{\mathcal Y}:\varphi(\mathcal X)\to\mathbb R$ such that $R = R_{\mathcal Y}\circ\varphi$ on $\mathcal X$. Equivalently, if $\varphi(x)=\varphi(x')$ then $R(x)=R(x')$.
core_assumption_text:
Projection compatibility
There exists a function $R_{\mathcal Y}:\varphi(\mathcal X)\to\mathbb R$ such that $R = R_{\mathcal Y}\circ\varphi$ on $\mathcal X$.
